text: maybe by doing a `|replace` on the footer includes, to disable that script, but it could cause other problems down the road if the replace is not specific enough
this is a simple one, but is there a way I can unpublish my entire blog?

We imported our old blog over and have our site live, but I still have kinks to work out with the blog templates. Our posts are showing up with shit styling and I need to pull them incase anyone stumbles on them. I could go one by one and unpublish posts, but that seems silly (there are hundreds of posts) and I still don't even know what that would do to the blog home.
remove from the nav, add noindex, nofollow, disallow to the head of the blog
:thumbsup: thanks <@UD53A9UUR> at least I now know there isn't some checkbox I can't find in the settings.
there isn’t, if there was though, and you found it, I’d owe you a beer at emmet’s
Does anyone know how to style AMP pages within HubSpot or if this is possible? First time working with AMP.
There are just basic styles available in amp.
